text: Little Pixie Geldof (born 17 September 1990) is a British model and singer- songwriter. She was born in London to Paula Yates. She is the youngest daughter of Bob Geldof and the second youngest of Yates' four daughters. When she was 17 she was on the cover of Tatler magazine. This was the first magazine cover she was on. She has a band called Violet. She is the singer and writes the songs. They released their first single in 2012. ==References== Category:1990 births Category:English singers Category:English songwriters Category:Living people Category:Models from London Category:Singers from London Category:Socialites
title: Pixie Geldof
